ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities

Class NavigationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities.NavigationUtils

  • public final class NavigationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Joseph Roque on 2015-07-16. Offers utilities to set up the navigation drawer for the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_NAVIGATION_DRAWER_WIDTH_DP
      Maximum width of the navigation drawer in dps.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_DRAWER_LEARNED
      Represents a boolean indicating if the navigation drawer has been opened for the user.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_BOWLERS
      Represents the item for bowlers in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_FEEDBACK
      Represents the item for feedback in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_HEADER
      Represents the header item in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_HELP
      Represents the item for help in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_LEAGUES
      Represents the item for leagues and events in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_SERIES
      Represents the item for series in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_ITEM_SETTINGS
      Represents the item for settings in the navigation drawer.
      static int NAVIGATION_STATIC_ITEMS
      Number of items at the top of the navigation drawer which do not change.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_SUBHEADER_GAMES
      Represents the subheader for games in the navigation drawer.
      static java.lang.String NAVIGATION_SUBHEADER_OTHER
      Represents the subheader for other in the navigation drawer.
